column4: Hello folks. I have Ubuntu, how do I share files on a Windows network, such that people on my Windows network can access some of my stuff?
I'm trying Samba, but I can't seem to get it to work.
I'm not putting up a webserver.
http://www.ubuntuguide.org/#sambaserver tells me how to install samba and smbfs. That's all. :(
I'm using Win2K on my other computers
http://www.ubuntuguide.org/#sharefolderstheeasyway -- this page is no use either
Well, no wonder. The guide is for hoary, and I am using Warty.
should be the same more than likely
in this case it's not the same
there is an older link for Warty on there too for the Warty guide
